title: WildFly 22.0.1 is released!
content: WildFly 22.0.1.Final is now available .  It’s been about a month since the WildFly 22 release, so we’ve done a small bug fix update, WildFly 22.0.1.  The full list of issues resolved in WildFly 22.0.1 is available . Issues resolved in the WildFly Core update included with WildFly 22.0.1 are available .  Enjoy!
